Comment: I just wasted my time listening to a dumb anorectic bitch screaming that we should revoke human rights from all non-us citizens. She did this while entangled in a fancy dress, on a social media platform that reaches millions.   This is why I still cling to the hope of funding for scientific studies on high voltage fashion dresses. I still believe they could serve a purpose as surprise, public, correctional executions without due process in authoritarian societies.
